TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Because some of the awe is acceptable but the full awe is unacceptable because the full awe affects emotions.

If "Hymn For The Weekend" exist, what about "Hymn For The Weekday"? If it exist, how will it sound?

It's sounds like workday, workday and no money.

If 2+2=fish, will then 3+3=33 ?

Dark orange.

Will Starship start yesterday?

Hooray i wake from yesterday.

When will i play ksp again?

When the sun is Rising

How do i Burn a kerbal?

Just leave him under sun.

How many Kerbals does it take to change a lightbulb

Spoiler

in a photon rocket.

 

Edited June 26, 2019 by kerbiloid

One. Divided by 8,900,000.

Does Boeing planes always bounce during landing, and are Airbus planes basically flying busses?

Edited June 26, 2019 by FahmiRBLXian

Airbus is just an abbreviation for "aerial omnibus", while Boeing just keeps boeing.

Were first Airbuses (i.e. aerial omnibuses) Pegasus-driven?

No, but the first Pegasi were dropped from Airbuses.

Why did Martin heed locks?

To hold him at his workplace, finishing the Ice&Fire series, instead of messing around with various by-product projects,

Was the Krypton planet radioactive?

Hardcore Brown cows have the experience and recount from their voyage, and say "Moo"

I bought a cookie for 2.99, i stuck it in the CD drive, but it downloaded minecraft? it was advirtised as kerbal space program? What happened?

 

Edited July 3, 2019 by LandBoatBuick

Notch Buys KSP and selled it to Microsoft and then merge it with Minecraft then delete KSP altogether

BTW WHERE THE HELL ARE WE?

We are where.

Why not?

When Not?

 

Why are we here? Just to suffer?

No. Just to reffus.

1. Why didn't the C-5M Super Galaxy reached other galaxies in time despite the nickname Galaxy?

2. Does the Douglas C-74, C-124 and Boeing C-17 good at the globe?

If place C-5M together with C-74, C-124, and C-17 in zero-G, they form a galaxy with three globes in orbit.

If B-17, B-29, and B-52 are fortresses, then where are their stone walls, gate towers, and moats?

Edited July 5, 2019 by kerbiloid

On the ground, already transformed into thousands of pieces.

Has the C-141 Starlifter lift a star? I mean, a space star, not a human star.

It can lift even 2x4 sky stars if an air-and-space-forces general sits onboard.

Who is bigger: a cap-tain, a chief-tain, or a moun-tain?

Edited July 5, 2019 by kerbiloid

Why?

That is mu question

Plane-tain?

Why did the above user not answer kerbiloids question

The user simply dicided not to 

Why is the world flat?

Because nobody has inflated it.

Inflating Universe. Where is the pump?

The pump includes your standard bicycle pump and car tyre pumps. As you pump air through it, only a minority of air fills in the tyre, while the rest of the air escaped and as the air escapes, the universe expands.

Why is a turbofan feels hot when a fan keeps people cool via evaporative cooling?

Because only true fans become turbofans, while others stay casual viewers.

If grow beans on the Moon, can they reach the Earth?

Yes, I mean, with the fact that the beanstalk which became long enough like in the fairy tale, scraping the surface of Earth. To do so you'll need a Lunar orbit station or a Lunar base and a very frequent water-transporting missions using SpaceX's Starship BFR.
